content: fr-1 footies keep your toosies toasty warm with these footies they are a quick and easy one skein project perfect as a stash buster or a gift supplies 1 skein of madelinetosh tosh vintage us 5 32 circular needles for magic loop or us 5 dpns tapestry needle stitch marker gauge 5 sts = 1 in stockinette stitch heel co 14 sts for the heel slip the first stitch of every row abbreviations purlwise co cast on starting with a purl row work 17 row of k knit stockinette stitch p purl work 4 row of garter stitch ssk- slip slip knit next row bobble 13 sts keep last stitch live on k2tog- knit 2 together needle sts stitches with right side facing and live stitch on right needle pick up and knit 12 sts along the side pm place marker of the heel 11 sts along the bottom the co edge and 13 sts along the other side of the bobble bind off heel 37 sts total ©2012 quirky bird knits- all rights reserved do not copy outside of personal use without permission from qbk do not sell items made with this pattern without permission from qbk quirkybirdknits@gmail com quirkybirdknits blogspot com page 1 fr-1 footies leg opening needle containing sts from the bottom of the foot row 1 ws k3 p31 k3 graft the sts together row 2 rs k37 weave in your ends make a second slipper in the same way work row 1 & 2 until you have a total of 18 pop the footies on your feet and enjoy that toasty row feeling foot at the end of the 18th row of the leg opening cast on 9 sts using the knitted cast on place marker and join to work in the round round 1 p3 k31 p12 round 2 knit repeat rounds 1 & 2 once repeat round 1 again round 6 p3 knit to end round 7 knit 7 pm this will be the new beginning of round knit to end knit 28 rounds or you can adjust the pattern to fit your foot here try on the footie knit the foot until it reaches the bone at the base of the big toe toe decreases round 1 k1 ssk k17 k2tog k2 ssk k17 k2tog k1 round 2 knit round 3 k1 ssk k15 k2tog k2 ssk k15 k2tog k1 round 4 knit continue in this fashion work a decrease round with 2 less sts on top and bottom of foot between decreases followed by a knit round until you have 14 sts left divide the remaining sts on to 2 needles one needle
